title: Day 1082
content:
# Day 1082

Today feels utterly surreal.

![[https://x.com/WhiteHouse/status/1898446369674936755](https://x.com/WhiteHouse/status/1898446369674936755)](https://miro.medium.com/1*BGBJAMisoEQ_T3R9fEcz6w.png)

![[https://x.com/Booerhaves/status/1898453268017053802](https://x.com/Booerhaves/status/1898453268017053802)](https://miro.medium.com/1*F5wkccNvQCtDmDwCpOgwCg.png)

Like come on guys. What do you think happens next?!?!?!?!?!?!?

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*Xk3hDpl0rOaxxgR1UsAgVA.png)

I'm so grateful to witness my country embrace sound money. Despite all the challenges the USA faces, we've nailed two things: our beautiful Constitution and now this bold step toward embracing Bitcoin. The future looks incredibly BRIGHT ORANGE.

3/8/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
